Portfolio

    About

EMC

Essential Macro Calculator is simple web application that aims to make calculating macros for athletes and average people easier and more timely. I personally would have benefited from a web app like this when I was trying to get lean. At the time I couldn't find a tool like this so I decided to build it with the intention of helping others in their journey to living healthier.

Website Github

Building an E-Commerce Website

In todays capitalist society, E-Commerce has become an essential part of business. By building the Specialized Website I have gained invaluable experience creating an effective E-Commerce website for a global company.

Single Page Web Applications

Throughout my development career I have realized the value a single page web application can bring to developers and users. The use of reusable components makes for a more efficient and intuitive UI development process, resulting in a higher quality product that elicits a better user experience. I chose to build this site with React to take advantage of its benefits and also increase my knowledge and expertise with a component based JavaScript library.

Mobile Friendly

With a vast majority of users visiting websites through their smart phones, having a mobile friendly website is crucial for every company. This project has allowed me to hone in my responsive design and development skills creating a more accessible and native experience for our users.
